channel.title: Dog on Curt Poff
channel.description: Recent content in Dog on Curt Poff

item.title: Meet Geordie
item.description: This poor guy showed up with an infected toe (which has since been amputated), a case of hookworms, numerous scars from god knows what kind of living conditions, and a big ol’ smile. Don’t believe me? He’s fitting in pretty well. We have an enclosed yard so he has free run to do his business. He’s attended several meet-and-greet events and has done very well at all. He’s also met all the local family members and most of their pets - doing very well at those too.
